data.name: Goalie Challenge VR
data.detailed_description:
Feel the thrill of being a goalie - catch, stop and block slap shots in this fun VR hockey game short for the HTC Vive.

  • Built by a hockey goalie for other goalies that are either too far away from ice or can't get enough of the action.
  • Fully immersive with surround sound and haptic vibration for realistic gameplay.
  • Multiple levels of difficulty, sit or stand, lefties and righties welcome.
  • HTC Vive compatible.
  • FREE TO PLAY!

data.short_description:
Feel the whizz of the puck fly by your skull in this fun and fast-paced goalie VR simulator for HTC Vive.
Fully immersive with surround sound and haptic vibration for a realistic hockey experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
